items.sentence: Do you still remember the name of your first teacher?
We provided the flood victims with food and clothing.
We were in the living room when we heard the gunshot.
We would move to a bigger house if we had more money.
When Tom was in the hospital, he read a lot of books.
You didn\'t eat all that chocolate I bought, did you?
You don\'t seem to be as talented as Tom seems to be.
You forgot to tell Tom where to meet us, didn\'t you?
We don\'t yet know if that\'s going to happen or not.
I came here by bus, but I think that I\'ll walk back.
